topics.title: Arduino Board Configuration
topics.description: Setting up Arduino board with L6474 library and stepper motor configuration.
evidence_quotes: I'm using the ST microelectronics L6474 library, and I've set the acceleration to very high.
I've set the maximum speed to 5000, which is about half of their maximum.

topics.title: Controller Tuning
topics.description: Tuning the PID controller for controlling the stepper motor.
evidence_quotes: Once we verified that this control works, it's time to tune the controller.
Sometimes you will need a bias, which we just add to our output of the controller.

topics.title: KI parameter adjustment
topics.description: The speaker is adjusting the KI parameter to achieve stable control.
evidence_quotes: It usually starts much lower than KP.
Let's go take a look at our code.

topics.title: KP parameter adjustment
topics.description: The speaker is adjusting the KP parameter to achieve stable control.

topics.title: Stepper Motor Settings
topics.description: Setting stepper mode and commands for controlling the stepper motor.
evidence_quotes: We've got some communication constants that we will be using.
In this case, we're going to be using stepper mode eight, which is eight divisions per step.

topics.title: Tuning of KP and KI parameters
topics.description: The speaker is adjusting the KP and KI parameters to achieve stable control.
evidence_quotes: Let's go take a look at our code.
